Module AppointmentScheduleAPP
Package Controller

Class NewCustomerController

java.lang.Object
Controller.NewCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class NewCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class creates new customer and saves them to the database. Multiple combo boxes are used so the user can make a specific selection. Checks are made throughout the process validating that the data meet the specifications.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the combo boxes in the NewCustomer form. The newDivisionCombo is set to invisible.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • newCountrySelection

      public void newCountrySelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets newDivisionCombo to visible after a selection is made in the newCountryCombo. Filters the list of divisions in the newDivisionCombo combo box based on the country selection.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pressing the #newCountrySelection combo box

    • onActSaveCustList

      public void onActSaveCustList(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Verifies that all fields are completed. If data is missing, an alert shows requesting user to complete all of the fields. Pulls data from the fields and saves to the customer table in the database. Alerts the user that the customer information was saved. Opens the CustomerList fxml.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pressing the #onActSaveCustList button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActNoSaveCustList

      public void onActNoSaveCustList(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Alerts the user that any data in the form will be lost. Opens the CustomerList fxml if the user selects "Yes".
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pressing the #onActNoSaveCustList button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionToMainMenu
